name: walt diseny world resort
description: There’s a reason why they call Orlando Florida’s Disney resort a “world”. The mega-resort Walt Disney World features four marvelous parks to lose yourself in the wonderful world of Disney.

name: europa park
description: The largest theme park in Germany, Europa Park is located in Rust. Attractions include Pirates in Batavia, which is an electrifying underground boat ride experience.

name: disneyland paris
description: On the outskirts of Paris is where you will find the European version of Disneyland, one of the best theme parks in the world. There are two parks to explore: Disneyland Park and Walt Disney Studios Park.

name: universal orlando resort
description: One of the world’s most famous theme parks, the three parks at  Universal Orlando Resort sees more than 10 million visitors per year.

name: tivoli gardens
description: Old meets new at Tivoli Gardens in Copenhagen, an amusement park that first opened in 1843. It sits right in the center of the city and has a range of rides, games, musicals, gardens and major concerts.

name: universal studio hollywood
description: Head to La-La Land for Universal Studios Hollywood, a movie-themed amusement park with thrilling rides. Top attractions include Fast & Furious Supercharged and Harry Potter and The Forbidden Journey.

name: cedar point
description: Opened in the late 1800s, Cedar Point is one of the older US theme parks. Located in Ohio, it spans 364 acres and is known as the roller coaster capital of the world.

name: universal studio japan
description: There’s world-class entertainment on offer at Universal Studios Japan, where you can enjoy great rides like Flight of the Hippogriff. The Tokyo-based theme park also features Spider-Man and Jurassic Park-themed attractions.

name: efteling
description: In Kaatsheuvel, you’ll find Efteling, Holland’s largest theme park which is also known as The World of Wonders. Attractions include adrenaline-pumping rollercoasters and spectacular park shows.

name: seaworld orlando
description: Embrace the aquatic life at SeaWorld Orlando with loads of exciting attractions. From rollercoasters to infinity falls, you’ll be sure to make a splash at SeaWorld Orlando.

name: ocean park hongkong
description: Seek out thrills at Ocean Park and Ride the Arctic Blast or experience the Wild Twister and much more at one of Hong Kong’s favorite theme parks.

name: lotte world
description: You will find the world’s largest indoor theme parks at Lotte World in Seoul, South Korea. There’s also an outdoor amusement park called Magic Island and an artificial island to explore.

name: ferrari world
description: Put the pedal to the metal at Ferrari World in Abu Dhabi. Find out what it’s like to be a Scuderia Ferrari driver with thrilling rides and roller coasters. Get ready for the G-Force!
